name: Rainbow play button for Roblox
description:
Just makes the play button on games glow through a rainbow of colours. Speed can be changed.

You may also like: https://userstyles.org/styles/176973/hello-roblox

user.name: CraX_e621
user.about: I make styles, mostly for Roblox.

additional_info: First release! Nothing much to say here.

discussions.name: It does work! simply go to line 12 or 52 delete all and copy this .btn-common-play-game-lg {
